caption.p: Monthly percentage of RSV-positive samples relative to the monthly meteorological variables. Monthly percentage of RSV-positive samples (black line, right Y-axis) is shown together with the monthly ( A) rainfall (in millimeters, dark blue region), ( B) relative humidity (%, brown region), ( C) temperature (in degrees Celsius, yellow region), and ( D) wind speed (in meters per second, green region). Climate value scales are shown on the left Y-axis.
